choices.text:
### Human:
Write a poem about AI with exactly 50 words
### Assistant:

The rise of AI,
A revolution untold.
It will change our world,
In ways we can't behold.

Technology so bold,
Creating new possibilities.
A future bright and bold,
With endless potentialities.

Yet as it grows in power,
We must ask, what is the cost?
Will AI be our downfall,
Or will it lead us to a blossomed coast?

Only time will tell the tale,
Of this new age of intelligence.
Let's embrace the change with care,
And make sure we don't lose our human essence.
